decision_conditions: Condition 41 (counter sales) of planning permission 21/03204/FUL is amended as follows:Prior to any counter sales taking place in any of the unit/s hereby approved, details of counter sales for the associated unit/s, including the associated proportion of floorspace and commercial sales, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Any counter sales shall form an ancillary part of the overall use of each unit. The use shall be only carried out in accordance with the approved details.Reason: To prevent a retail use from being established and to ensure the Transport Assessment is a fair representation of the proposed development.
